review_data.title: Variety of food in a Mall

review_data.title: Great place to grab whatever you want to eat

review_data.title: Top floor - quiet environment to catch up with friends

review_data.title: Terrace with a View

review_data.title: Jelmolis food court

review_data.title: Nice terrace
